greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Even bisection of A263087; number of solutions to x - d(x) = 4(n^2), where d(x) is the number of divisors of x (A000005).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: p = 0; for(n=0, 10000, k = A263250(n); p += k; write("b263250.txt", n, " ", k); write("b263252.txt", n, " ", p)); \\ Compute A263250 and A263252 at the same time.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 07 2015
